entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
